rules.description: YAML field 'version' must equal '1.0'
YAML field 'date' must equal '2025-09-15'
YAML field 'deprecated' must equal 'False'
YAML field 'classification' must equal 'PUBLIC - Token Framework Standards'
YAML list 'token_definition.purpose' must contain 3 elements: ['utility', 'governance', 'reward']
YAML list 'token_definition.explicit_exclusions' must contain 5 elements: ['investment', 'security', 'e_money', 'yield_bearing', 'redemption_rights']

rules.expected_value: Pure utility token for identity verification services
rules.description: YAML field 'token_definition.legal_position' must equal 'Pure utility token for identity verification services'
rules.validation_method: yaml_field_equals("20_foundation/tokenomics/ssid_token_framework.yaml", "token_definition.legal_position", 'Pure utility token for identity verification services')

rules.description: YAML field 'technical_specification.blockchain' must equal 'Polygon (EVM Compatible)'
YAML field 'technical_specification.standard' must equal 'ERC-20 Compatible'
YAML field 'technical_specification.supply_model' must equal 'Fixed cap with deflationary mechanisms'
YAML field 'technical_specification.custody_model' must equal 'Non-custodial by design'
YAML field 'technical_specification.smart_contract_automation' must equal 'Full autonomous distribution'
YAML field 'fee_structure.scope' must equal 'identity_verification_payments_only'
YAML field 'fee_structure.total_fee' must equal '3% of identity verification transactions'
YAML field 'fee_structure.allocation' must equal '1% dev (direct), 2% system treasury'
YAML field 'fee_structure.burn_from_system_fee' must equal '50% of 2% with daily/monthly caps'
YAML field 'fee_structure.fee_collection' must equal 'Smart contract automated'
YAML field 'fee_structure.no_manual_intervention' must equal 'True'
YAML field 'legal_safe_harbor.security_token' must equal 'False'
YAML field 'legal_safe_harbor.e_money_token' must equal 'False'
YAML field 'legal_safe_harbor.stablecoin' must equal 'False'
YAML field 'legal_safe_harbor.yield_bearing' must equal 'False'
YAML field 'legal_safe_harbor.redemption_rights' must equal 'False'
YAML field 'legal_safe_harbor.passive_income' must equal 'False'
YAML field 'legal_safe_harbor.investment_contract' must equal 'False'

rules.expected_value: No privileged admin keys. Proxy owner = DAO Timelock; emergency multisig acts only via time-locked governance paths (no direct overrides).
rules.description: YAML field 'legal_safe_harbor.admin_controls' must equal 'No privileged admin keys. Proxy owner = DAO Timelock; emergency multisig acts only via time-locked governance paths (no direct overrides).'
rules.validation_method: yaml_field_equals("20_foundation/tokenomics/ssid_token_framework.yaml", "legal_safe_harbor.admin_controls", 'No privileged admin keys. Proxy owner = DAO Timelock; emergency multisig acts only via time-locked governance paths (no direct overrides).')

rules.expected_value: On-chain proposals only via DAO governance
rules.description: YAML field 'legal_safe_harbor.upgrade_mechanism' must equal 'On-chain proposals only via DAO governance'

rules.expected_value: Technology publisher and open source maintainer
rules.description: YAML field 'business_model.role' must equal 'Technology publisher and open source maintainer'
YAML list 'business_model.not_role' must contain 4 elements: ['payment_service_provider', 'custodian', 'operator', 'exchange']
YAML field 'business_model.user_interactions' must equal 'Direct peer-to-peer via smart contracts'
YAML field 'business_model.kyc_responsibility' must equal 'Third-party KYC providers (users pay directly)'
YAML field 'business_model.data_custody' must equal 'Zero personal data on-chain'
YAML field 'governance_framework.dao_ready' must equal 'True'
YAML field 'governance_framework.voting_mechanism' must equal 'Token-weighted governance'
YAML field 'governance_framework.proposal_system' must equal 'Snapshot + on-chain execution'
YAML field 'governance_framework.upgrade_authority' must equal 'DAO only (no admin keys)'
YAML field 'governance_framework.emergency_procedures' must equal 'Community multisig'

rules.expected_value: See detailed governance_parameters section below for quorum, timelock, and voting requirements
rules.description: YAML field 'governance_framework.reference' must equal 'See detailed governance_parameters section below for quorum, timelock, and voting requirements'
rules.validation_method: yaml_field_equals("20_foundation/tokenomics/ssid_token_framework.yaml", "governance_framework.reference", 'See detailed governance_parameters section below for quorum, timelock, and voting requirements')

rules.description: YAML field 'jurisdictional_compliance.reference' must equal 'See 23_compliance/jurisdictions/coverage_matrix.yaml for complete exclusion lists'
YAML list 'jurisdictional_compliance.blacklist_jurisdictions' must contain 4 elements: ['IR', 'KP', 'SY', 'CU']
YAML list 'jurisdictional_compliance.excluded_entities' must contain 3 elements: ['RU_designated_entities', 'Belarus_designated_entities', 'Venezuela_government_entities']
YAML list 'jurisdictional_compliance.excluded_markets' must contain 3 elements: ['India', 'Pakistan', 'Myanmar']

rules.expected_value: EU MiCA Article 3 + US Howey Test
rules.description: YAML field 'jurisdictional_compliance.compliance_basis' must equal 'EU MiCA Article 3 + US Howey Test'
YAML field 'jurisdictional_compliance.regulatory_exemptions' must equal 'Utility token exemption'
YAML field 'risk_mitigation.no_fiat_pegging' must equal 'True'
YAML field 'risk_mitigation.no_redemption_mechanism' must equal 'True'
YAML field 'risk_mitigation.no_yield_promises' must equal 'True'
YAML field 'risk_mitigation.no_marketing_investment' must equal 'True'
YAML field 'risk_mitigation.clear_utility_purpose' must equal 'True'
YAML field 'risk_mitigation.open_source_license' must equal 'Apache 2.0'
YAML field 'version' must equal '1.0'
YAML field 'date' must equal '2025-09-15'
YAML field 'deprecated' must equal 'False'

rules.expected_value: Pay for identity score calculations and verifications
rules.description: YAML field 'primary_utilities.identity_verification.description' must equal 'Pay for identity score calculations and verifications'
rules.validation_method: yaml_field_equals("20_foundation/tokenomics/utility_definitions.yaml", "primary_utilities.identity_verification.description", 'Pay for identity score calculations and verifications')

rules.description: YAML field 'primary_utilities.identity_verification.smart_contract' must equal '20_foundation/tokenomics/contracts/verification_payment.sol'
YAML field 'primary_utilities.identity_verification.fee_burn_mechanism' must equal 'Deflationary token economics'

rules.expected_value: Burns originate exclusively from treasury portion of 3% system fee (no direct verification fee split)
rules.description: YAML field 'primary_utilities.identity_verification.burn_source_note' must equal 'Burns originate exclusively from treasury portion of 3% system fee (no direct verification fee split)'
rules.validation_method: yaml_field_equals("20_foundation/tokenomics/utility_definitions.yaml", "primary_utilities.identity_verification.burn_source_note", 'Burns originate exclusively from treasury portion of 3% system fee (no direct verification fee split)')

rules.expected_value: No manual/admin burns. Programmatic burns allowed only from the treasury portion of the 3% system fee and failed proposal deposits, as defined in token_economics.
rules.description: YAML field 'primary_utilities.identity_verification.burn_clarification' must equal 'No manual/admin burns. Programmatic burns allowed only from the treasury portion of the 3% system fee and failed proposal deposits, as defined in token_economics.'
rules.validation_method: yaml_field_equals("20_foundation/tokenomics/utility_definitions.yaml", "primary_utilities.identity_verification.burn_clarification", 'No manual/admin burns. Programmatic burns allowed only from the treasury portion of the 3% system fee and failed proposal deposits, as defined in token_economics.')

rules.expected_value: Vote on protocol upgrades and parameter changes
rules.description: YAML field 'primary_utilities.governance_participation.description' must equal 'Vote on protocol upgrades and parameter changes'
rules.validation_method: yaml_field_equals("20_foundation/tokenomics/utility_definitions.yaml", "primary_utilities.governance_participation.description", 'Vote on protocol upgrades and parameter changes')

rules.description: YAML field 'primary_utilities.governance_participation.voting_weight' must equal 'Linear token holdings'
YAML field 'primary_utilities.governance_participation.proposal_threshold' must equal '1% of total supply to propose'

rules.expected_value: Reward validators, contributors, and ecosystem participants
rules.description: YAML field 'primary_utilities.ecosystem_rewards.description' must equal 'Reward validators, contributors, and ecosystem participants'
YAML field 'primary_utilities.ecosystem_rewards.distribution_method' must equal 'Merit-based allocation via DAO'
YAML list 'primary_utilities.ecosystem_rewards.reward_pools' must contain 3 elements: ['validation', 'development', 'community']

rules.expected_value: Stake tokens for enhanced verification services
rules.description: YAML field 'primary_utilities.staking_utility.description' must equal 'Stake tokens for enhanced verification services'
YAML field 'primary_utilities.staking_utility.staking_rewards' must equal 'Service fee discounts (not yield)'
YAML field 'primary_utilities.staking_utility.slashing_conditions' must equal 'False verification penalties'
YAML field 'compliance_utilities.audit_payments' must equal 'Pay for compliance audit services'

rules.expected_value: Submit regulatory reports with token fees
rules.description: YAML field 'compliance_utilities.regulatory_reporting' must equal 'Submit regulatory reports with token fees'
YAML field 'compliance_utilities.legal_attestations' must equal 'Create verifiable compliance attestations'
YAML field 'secondary_utilities.marketplace_access' must equal 'Access to identity verification marketplace'
YAML field 'secondary_utilities.premium_features' must equal 'Enhanced verification algorithms'

rules.expected_value: Developer API rate limiting and access control
rules.description: YAML field 'secondary_utilities.api_access' must equal 'Developer API rate limiting and access control'
rules.validation_method: yaml_field_equals("20_foundation/tokenomics/utility_definitions.yaml", "secondary_utilities.api_access", 'Developer API rate limiting and access control')

rules.description: YAML field 'secondary_utilities.data_portability' must equal 'Export/import verification data'
YAML field 'version' must equal '1.0'
YAML field 'date' must equal '2025-09-21'
YAML field 'deprecated' must equal 'False'
YAML field 'supply_mechanics.total_supply' must equal '1,000,000,000 SSID'
YAML field 'supply_mechanics.initial_distribution.ecosystem_development' must equal '40%'
YAML field 'supply_mechanics.initial_distribution.community_rewards' must equal '25%'
YAML field 'supply_mechanics.initial_distribution.team_development' must equal '15%'
YAML field 'supply_mechanics.initial_distribution.partnerships' must equal '10%'
YAML field 'supply_mechanics.initial_distribution.reserve_fund' must equal '10%'
YAML field 'supply_mechanics.deflationary_mechanisms.governance_burning' must equal 'Unsuccessful proposals burn deposit'

rules.expected_value: Penalties for false verification or equivocation
rules.description: YAML field 'supply_mechanics.deflationary_mechanisms.staking_slashing' must equal 'Penalties for false verification or equivocation'
YAML field 'supply_mechanics.circulation_controls.max_annual_inflation' must equal '0%'
YAML field 'supply_mechanics.circulation_controls.team_vesting_schedule' must equal '25% per year over 4 years'
YAML field 'supply_mechanics.circulation_controls.partnership_unlock' must equal 'Milestone-based'
YAML field 'supply_mechanics.circulation_controls.reserve_governance' must equal 'DAO-controlled release only'
YAML field 'fee_routing.system_fees.scope' must equal 'identity_verification_payments_only'

rules.expected_value: 3% system fee applies to identity verification transactions only
rules.description: YAML field 'fee_routing.system_fees.note' must equal '3% system fee applies to identity verification transactions only'
rules.validation_method: yaml_field_equals("20_foundation/tokenomics/token_economics.yaml", "fee_routing.system_fees.note", '3% system fee applies to identity verification transactions only')

rules.description: YAML field 'fee_routing.system_fees.total_fee' must equal '3% of verification transaction value'
YAML field 'fee_routing.system_fees.allocation.dev_fee' must equal '1% direct developer reward'
YAML field 'fee_routing.system_fees.allocation.system_treasury' must equal '2% system treasury'
YAML field 'fee_routing.system_fees.burn_from_system_fee.policy' must equal '50% of treasury share burned'
YAML field 'fee_routing.system_fees.burn_from_system_fee.base' must equal 'circulating_supply_snapshot'
YAML field 'fee_routing.system_fees.burn_from_system_fee.snapshot_time_utc' must equal '00:00:00'
YAML field 'fee_routing.system_fees.burn_from_system_fee.daily_cap_percent_of_circ' must equal '0.5'
YAML field 'fee_routing.system_fees.burn_from_system_fee.monthly_cap_percent_of_circ' must equal '2.0'
YAML field 'fee_routing.system_fees.burn_from_system_fee.oracle_source' must equal 'on-chain circulating supply oracle (DAO-controlled)'
YAML field 'fee_routing.validator_rewards.source' must equal 'Treasury budget (DAO-decided monthly allocation)'
YAML field 'fee_routing.validator_rewards.no_per_transaction_split' must equal 'True'

rules.expected_value: Old fee split (50/25/15/10) is deprecated and replaced by fixed 3% system fee.
rules.description: YAML field 'fee_routing.validator_rewards.note' must equal 'Old fee split (50/25/15/10) is deprecated and replaced by fixed 3% system fee.'
rules.validation_method: yaml_field_equals("20_foundation/tokenomics/token_economics.yaml", "fee_routing.validator_rewards.note", 'Old fee split (50/25/15/10) is deprecated and replaced by fixed 3% system fee.')

rules.description: YAML field 'governance_fees.proposal_deposits' must equal '100% burned if proposal fails'
YAML field 'governance_fees.voting_gas' must equal 'Subsidized from treasury fund'
YAML field 'governance_controls.authority' must equal 'DAO_only'
YAML field 'governance_controls.reference' must equal '07_governance_legal/governance_defaults.yaml'

rules.expected_value: All governance parameters centrally defined - see governance_parameters section
rules.description: YAML field 'governance_controls.note' must equal 'All governance parameters centrally defined - see governance_parameters section'
rules.validation_method: yaml_field_equals("20_foundation/tokenomics/token_economics.yaml", "governance_controls.note", 'All governance parameters centrally defined - see governance_parameters section')

rules.description: YAML field 'staking_mechanics.minimum_stake' must equal '1000 SSID'
YAML field 'staking_mechanics.maximum_discount' must equal '50% fee reduction'
YAML field 'staking_mechanics.slashing_penalty' must equal '5% of staked amount'
YAML field 'staking_mechanics.unstaking_period' must equal '14 days'
YAML field 'staking_mechanics.discount_applies_to' must equal 'user_service_price_only'
YAML field 'staking_mechanics.system_fee_invariance' must equal 'True'
YAML field 'governance_parameters.proposal_framework.proposal_threshold' must equal '1% of total supply (10,000,000 SSID)'
YAML field 'governance_parameters.proposal_framework.proposal_deposit' must equal '10,000 SSID (burned if proposal fails)'

YAML list 'governance_parameters.proposal_framework.proposal_types' must contain 4 elements: ['Protocol upgrades (requires supermajority)', 'Parameter changes (requires simple majority)', 'Treasury allocation (requires quorum + majority)', 'Emergency proposals (expedited process)']
rules.validation_method: yaml_list_equals("20_foundation/tokenomics/token_economics.yaml", "governance_parameters.proposal_framework.proposal_types", ['Protocol upgrades (requires supermajority)', 'Parameter changes (requires simple majority)', 'Treasury allocation (requires quorum + majority)', 'Emergency proposals (expedited process)'])

rules.description: YAML field 'governance_parameters.voting_requirements.quorum_standard' must equal '4% of circulating supply'
YAML field 'governance_parameters.voting_requirements.quorum_protocol_upgrade' must equal '8% of circulating supply'
YAML field 'governance_parameters.voting_requirements.quorum_emergency' must equal '2% of circulating supply'
YAML field 'governance_parameters.voting_requirements.simple_majority' must equal '50% + 1 of votes cast'
YAML field 'governance_parameters.voting_requirements.supermajority' must equal '66.7% of votes cast'
YAML field 'governance_parameters.voting_requirements.emergency_supermajority' must equal '75% of votes cast'
YAML field 'governance_parameters.timelock_framework.standard_proposals' must equal '48 hours minimum execution delay'
YAML field 'governance_parameters.timelock_framework.protocol_upgrades' must equal '168 hours (7 days) execution delay'
YAML field 'governance_parameters.timelock_framework.parameter_changes' must equal '24 hours execution delay'
YAML field 'governance_parameters.timelock_framework.emergency_proposals' must equal '6 hours execution delay (security only)'
YAML field 'governance_parameters.timelock_framework.treasury_allocations' must equal '72 hours execution delay'

YAML field 'governance_parameters.voting_periods.protocol_upgrade_voting' must equal '14 days (336 hours)'
YAML field 'governance_parameters.voting_periods.emergency_voting' must equal '24 hours (security issues only)'
YAML field 'governance_parameters.voting_periods.parameter_voting' must equal '5 days (120 hours)'

YAML field 'governance_parameters.delegation_system.self_delegation_default' must equal 'True'
YAML field 'governance_parameters.delegation_system.delegation_changes' must equal 'Immediate effect'
YAML field 'governance_parameters.delegation_system.vote_weight_calculation' must equal 'Token balance + delegated tokens'
YAML field 'governance_parameters.governance_rewards.voter_participation_rewards' must equal '0.1% of treasury per quarter'
YAML field 'governance_parameters.governance_rewards.proposal_creator_rewards' must equal '1000 SSID for successful proposals'
YAML field 'governance_parameters.governance_rewards.delegate_rewards' must equal 'Based on participation and performance'
YAML field 'governance_parameters.governance_rewards.minimum_participation' must equal '10% of voting power for rewards'
